remarks: The set of projective automorphisms.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pautset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pautset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
pautsetN $p |- ( K e. B -> M = { f | ( f : S -1-1-onto-> S /\ A. x e. S A. y e. S ( x C_ y <-> ( f ` x ) C_ ( f ` y ) ) ) } ) $.
$d K f x $.
$d S f x y $.
$d f x y $.
